name: R0d3nt
description:
R0d3nt is my first "proper" game.
It was made using Phaser CE. 

It can be finished in roughly 5 to 10 minutes.

Music by Bad Ass Wolf Shirt

Sprites by Marvin-Z

--------

CONTROLS :

Arrows to move

X to shoot

C to dash

SPACE/UP to jump

--------

TIPS:

You can double jump. falling off ledges do not count as one jump.

You will be outnumbered, Use the environment against the enemies.

--------

Comments, feedback as well as reviews are much appreciated.

Just don't hurt my feelings too much
